Energy Storage Solutions

Encap

Electrostatic storage module delivering high efficiency, non-degrading performance for C&I and residential systems.

At a glance

Key product details for quick comparison.

Segment

Commercial, industrial, and residential storage

Key differentiators

Non-degrading performance with 100% DoD and 99.1% round-trip efficiency.

Technology

Electrostatic, encapsulated capacitor storage (non-chemical).

Module

10 kWh, 48 V module.

Benefits

  • High round-trip efficiency for energy savings.
  • Non-degrading performance over long lifetimes.
  • Supports full depth of discharge.
  • Maintenance-free operation (partner stated).

Use cases

Commercial and industrial energy storage

Residential storage systems

Backup power and resiliency

Technical specs

Module energy 10 kWh (48 V)
Round-trip efficiency 99.1%
Depth of discharge 100%
Maintenance No routine maintenance (partner stated)

Specifications vary by model and configuration; refer to datasheets.

Downloads and resources

  • Enercap America product overview Overview
